title: Foreign Policy Beginnings
description: Chapter 2 - Sattar - Pakistan's Foreign Policy: Foreign Policy Beginnings

questions_attributes.question_text: Who was the Finance Minister in October, 1949?
Who opposed the Middle East Defence Organization (MEDO) in 1952, endorsed by Truman Administration?
Who became the President of United States in January, 1953?
What was the assessment of John Foster Dulles, the Secretary of State of USA, when he visited Pakistan?

question_options_attributes.option_text: Pakistan is a spirited nation which can resist communism
India was more hospitable and a better component for defence in Middle East
Pakistan will soon join the Soviet Union and will be a threat to USA
Pakistan's armed forces are not efficient enough for the defense

questions_attributes.question_text: Who was the US Ambassador to India during 1950s?
What was the cause of some friction between USA and Chester Bowles (and British as well)?

question_options_attributes.option_text: Aid to Pakistan will antagonize India which is far more powerful and better prospect
There was no friction between the parties when it comes to Pakistan
Chester Bowles believed that antagonizing democratic India is a mistake as it will counter communist China
Eisenhower did not like the tone of Chester Bowles and the British Policy

questions_attributes.question_text: What were the reason(s) due to which USA's military aid to Pakistan was halted?

question_options_attributes.option_text: British was the only and main reason behind the halting of the aid
Dulles and Eisenhower did not want to antagonize India
Nehru's arguments and 'rebuttals' 'backed the US Administration into a corner'
The USA's administration within was not inclined to provide the aid to Pakistan

questions_attributes.question_text: Which people were in favor of giving Pakistan the military aid?
When was the mutual defence argument signed between Pakistan and USA?
What was the main motivation of SEATO in 1954 (South East Asia Treaty Organization)?

question_options_attributes.option_text: Promote peace within the Middle East
The French Defeat in Dien Bien Phu

questions_attributes.question_text: What were the main reservations of Pakistan against SEATO?

question_options_attributes.option_text: USA allocated little budget to Pakistan for the defence
USA only covered East Pakistan and not the whole area of Pakistan
USA asked Pakistan to not join SEATO if it is to appease USA only
SEATO will only provide consultancy and not military action, unlike NATO

questions_attributes.question_text: When did Pakistan leave SEATO?
What were the main reservations of Pakistan against signing Baghdad Pact?

question_options_attributes.option_text: Pakistan was disappointed in USA's military aid and did not want to participate in any more pacts
Pakistan did not like that India was joining the pact
Turkey had recognized Israel which goes against Pakistan's policy
Egypt's Nasser had denounced the Baghdad Pact

questions_attributes.question_text: When did Pakistan sign CENTO (Baghdad Pact)?
Why was the Baghdad Pact named to CENTO in 1959?

question_options_attributes.option_text: Because India gave the suggestion to do so
Due to more budget allocation of USA and UK
Because of Iraqi Coup in 1958 which denounced the Baghdad Pact
Due to suggestion of the NATO and integration of CENTO and NATO

questions_attributes.question_text: What was the name of base established by United States in 1957 in Pakistan, as reported by Prime Minister Suhrawardy?
What was the purpose of the Badaber Base?

question_options_attributes.option_text: Eavesdropping on the Soviet Union and China

questions_attributes.question_text: When was Bilateral Defence Cooperation Agreement signed between USA and Pakistan?
What was response of USA when Pakistan brought up the Defence Pact in 1965 and 1971 against Indian aggression?

question_options_attributes.option_text: The pact was in light of Communist aggression only
India is a friendly member of USA
Kashmir was never an interest of USA
The military aid was transactional only

questions_attributes.question_text: When was the U-2 Plane (from Badaber base) show down by Soviet Union?
